description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-33695 - Could not read message Exception while extracting messages from PST
NETWORKNET-33704 - Chartset porblem when saving EML
NETWORKNET-33710 - Saving photo data from VCard gives ArgumentException was Unhandled
NETWORKNET-33724 - Message that was extracted from PST file with PersonalStorage.SaveMessageToStream loses attachments
NETWORKNET-33725 - Encoding problem while rendering messages to mhtml format
NETWORKNET-33732 - Issue with long encoded MailAddress display name
NETWORKNET-33733 - German special characters not handled properly while converting MSG to MHTML format
NETWORKNET-33734 - EML meeting with no Recepients conversion to MSG gives ArgumentNullException
NETWORKNET-33735 - FormatException while loading the ICS file
NETWORKNET-33737 - EML to MHTML conversion - accentuated characters not displayed properly
NETWORKNET-33739 - Outlook 2010 Received Date column set to NONE for PST created from AE 2.8.0
NETWORKNET-33740 - Exception "UriFormatException was unhandled" raised for ICS file
NETWORKNET-33726 - Scanpst reports errors for a PST created with Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33730 - Copy body to PR_RTF_COMPRESSED	
NETWORKNET-33703	Spelling correction for SmtpClientBulkSendAgent's TotalSent

New Features	
NETWORKNET-33392 -  Adding MapiContact, MapiNote, MapiTask, MapiJournal, and MapiCalendar to PST
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
